item.description: Bring your ideas. It has come to my attention that we have several babies that are in need of medical attention. I want to plan a garage sale and craft sale to raise money for a medical account for these babies. They are in our group. I will be talking with my accountant to make sure it is set up as non-taxable money. I am planning to do this in May or June depending on the groups input... So bring your ideas; a snack or drink to share and the theme for this party is wear your green.. Happy St. Paddy's Party...

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: March Pug Party
